SELECT m_prj_risk.id, m_prj_risk.name, m_prj_risk.description, m_prj_risk.projectId, m_prj_risk.createdUser, m_prj_risk.assignUser, m_prj_risk.consequence, m_prj_risk.probalitity, m_prj_risk.status, m_prj_risk.dateraised, m_prj_risk.dueDate, m_prj_risk.startdate, m_prj_risk.enddate, m_prj_risk.response, m_prj_risk.resolution, m_prj_risk.priority, m_prj_risk.source, m_prj_risk.createdTime, m_prj_risk.lastUpdatedTime, m_prj_risk.sAccountId, raisedUser.avatarId AS raisedByUserAvatarId, concat(raisedUser.firstname, ' ', LTRIM(concat(IFNULL(raisedUser.middlename, ''), ' ')), raisedUser.lastname) AS raisedByUserFullName, assignedUser.avatarId AS assignToUserAvatarId, concat(assignedUser.firstname, ' ', LTRIM(concat(IFNULL(assignedUser.middlename, ''), ' ')), assignedUser.lastname) AS assignedToUserFullName, m_prj_project.name as projectName, m_prj_project.shortname AS projectShortName, m_prj_risk.milestoneid, m_prj_milestone.name AS milestoneName, (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(m_prj_time_logging.logValue), 0) FROM m_prj_time_logging WHERE m_prj_time_logging.projectId = m_prj_risk.projectId AND m_prj_time_logging.type='Project-Risk' AND m_prj_time_logging.typeId=m_prj_risk.id AND m_prj_time_logging.isBillable = 1) AS billableHours, (SELECT COALESCE(SUM(m_prj_time_logging.logValue), 0) FROM m_prj_time_logging WHERE m_prj_time_logging.projectId = m_prj_risk.projectId AND m_prj_time_logging.type='Project-Risk' AND m_prj_time_logging.typeId=m_prj_risk.id AND m_prj_time_logging.isBillable = 0) AS nonBillableHours FROM m_prj_risk LEFT OUTER JOIN s_user as raisedUser ON (m_prj_risk.createdUser=raisedUser.username) LEFT OUTER JOIN s_user as assignedUser ON ( m_prj_risk.assignUser=assignedUser.username) LEFT OUTER JOIN m_prj_project ON (m_prj_risk.projectId = m_prj_project.id) LEFT OUTER JOIN m_prj_milestone ON (m_prj_milestone.id = m_prj_risk.milestoneid)
